legacy_code:
c adjust the array of borrowed books 
do 
jr = ir , ubbcnt - 1 
ur.ubb(jr) = ur.ubb(jr + 1) 
end do 
ubbcnt = ubbcnt - 1 
segadj, ur segdes, ur*MOD

integer iur
c see whether the user exists in the structure       
       iur = fndur(lib, name)
       if (iur .eq. 0) then 
         write(*,*) 'cannot find user ', name
         return
       endif 
       write(*,*) 'borbk: iur =', iur

integer ibk
c see whether the book exists in the structure       
       ibk = fndbk(lib, title)
       if (ibk .eq. 0) then 
         write(*,*) 'cannot find book ', title
         return
       endif 
       write(*,*) 'borbk: ibk=', ibk
